summary: Discussion focused on creating a roadmap presentation for Michael, specifically around Salesforce implementation work and value streams. The team needed to organize work items and estimates into a calendar view with different phases and associated costs.
decisions: Organize roadmap by value streams (application intake, credit, documentation, funding, broker relations, etc.)
Structure presentation with calendar view showing phases and milestones
Include time tracking implementation in July
action_items: Create roadmap presentation for meeting in 1.5 hours
Add time estimates and costs for initial phase
Map out initiatives across value streams
concerns: Limited time to prepare roadmap (meeting in 1.5 hours)
Need for better definition of time tracking requirements
michael_priorities: Wants to see calendar view of phases and milestones
Needs cost estimates for budgeting purposes
Interested in actual Salesforce work items rather than high-level executive goals
commitments: Will create roadmap showing phases and associated costs
Will provide estimates for initial 2-3 months of work
Will map out high-level activities for full year
